Package com.amilesend.tmdb.client.model

Interface BodyBasedRequest

All Superinterfaces:
QueryParameterBasedRequest
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddFavoriteRequest, AddMovieRequest, AddRatingRequest, AddRatingRequest, AddRatingRequest, AddWatchlistRequest, ClearListRequest, CreateListRequest, CreateSessionRequest, DeleteSessionRequest, RemoveMovieRequest
public interface BodyBasedRequest extends QueryParameterBasedRequest
Defines a request that contains a JSON-based body to be included in an HTTP post request.
